DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effects of high doses of candesartan cilexetil and also to assess which dose (16mg, 64mg, 128mg) is the most optimal for the maximum reduction of proteinuria.
DOC.brief_title: High Doses of Candesartan Cilexetil on the Reduction of Proteinuria
